front.title: •••Defel
front.gametext: Under 'nighttime conditions,' may use 1 Force to 'hide' (exclude himself) from a battle. While at a site affected by Revolution, opponent must lose 1 Force during your control phase.
front.lore: Male Defel from Af'El. This species, also known as 'wraiths,' is capable of warping light around themselves, becoming difficult to see at dusk.

rulings: Each Defel can cause 1 Force loss per turn.
